Module com.github.sormuras.bach

Package com.github.sormuras.bach.lookup

package com.github.sormuras.bach.lookup
Provides the classes and interfaces used for looking up external modules.

Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ModuleLookup
    A function that returns an optional string representation of a URI for a given module name.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ExternalModuleLookup
    A stable module lookup for an external module.
    ExternalModuleLookupBuilder
    A builder of external module objects.
    FXGLModuleLookup
    Maps "Java/JavaFX/Kotlin Game Library" module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    GitHubReleasesModuleLookup
    Find modular JAR files attached to a GitHub Release.
    JavaFXModuleLookup
    Maps well-known JavaFX module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    JUnitJupiterModuleLookup
    Maps well-known JUnit Jupiter module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    JUnitPlatformModuleLookup
    Maps well-known JUnit Platform module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    LWJGLModuleLookup
    Maps well-known LWJGL module names to their Maven Central artifacts.
    Maven
    Maven-related utilities.
    Maven.Joiner
    A Maven unified resource identifier string representation builder.
    ModuleMetadata
     
    ModuleMetadata.Checksum
     
    SormurasModulesModuleLookup
    Look up unique modules published at Maven Central.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    JUnit
    Lookup well-known JUnit modules published at Maven Central.
    LookupStability
    A classification of the stability of a module lookup implementation.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    LookupException
    Thrown when an error occurs looking up an external module.
